title: looking for friends. preferably my skill level
body:
just looking for players who play daily to join for any game type .
silver 2 support main but can play jg and mid well enough.
got discord and all that jazz
just add me in game @KingVascal

replies.body:
not on every day (mostly nights) but I enjoy midven and love my friends while hating my enemies. 
sometimes laggy g3 mid/top/bot main however I use the silver account the most
